SEARCH
程序包 manager

类 ApplianceManager

java.lang.Object
manager.ApplianceManager
public class ApplianceManager extends Object
The ApplianceManager class is responsible for managing a collection of appliances, including displaying a user menu, and processing user requests to check out appliances, find appliances by brand, display appliances by type, and produce a random list of appliances.

This class utilizes an ApplianceLoader to load and save appliance data.

从以下版本开始:
2024-09-19
作者:
Tianzi Cui

    ApplianceManager()

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    void
    checkoutAppliance()
    Checks out an appliance based on the user's input item number.
    void
    displayApplianceByType()
    Displays appliances based on their type, allowing the user to specify additional filters based on the appliance's attributes.
    void
    displayMenu()
    Displays the main menu and processes user input to perform different actions based on it.
    void
    findApplianceByBrand()
    Finds and displays appliances based on brand.
    void
    loadAppliances()
    Loads appliances from the file using the ApplianceLoader.
    void
    randomApplianceList()
    Produces and displays a random list of appliances based on user input.
    void
    saveAndExit()
    Saves the current list of appliances and exits the application.
